程序包 P2V

类 AnimationController

java.lang.Object
P2V.AnimationController
public class AnimationController extends Object
AnimationController is in charge of calculating animation.
作者:
Telsa

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AnimationController

      public AnimationController(float startValue, float targetValue, float duration)
      Constructs an AnimationController with the given start value, target value, and duration.
      参数:
      startValue - the start value of the animation
      targetValue - the target value of the animation
      duration - the duration of the animation

    • AnimationController

      public AnimationController(float startValue, float targetValue, float duration, int mode)
      Constructs an AnimationController with the given start value, target value, duration, and animation mode.
      参数:
      startValue - the start value of the animation
      targetValue - the target value of the animation
      duration - the duration of the animation
      mode - the animation mode
